nodes.text: The River Lands were an area located on the planet Nal Hutta, surrounded by the Old Muckworks, the Drainage Isle, the bog and the Rust Yards. The river itself was inhabited by infected and mutant chemilizards.

Donal's brother had a farmhouse in the River Lands until he was killed by Fa'athra's goons. Around the same time, one of Nem'ro's spice freighter was shot down over Fa'athra airspace and crashed in the River Lands.
